name: Blues and Bullets - Digital Comic
description: The Blues and Bullets comic is an interactive app that will immerse you in the story, passions, motivations and dark secrets of the characters that, in one way or another, are caught in the web of intrigue that will shape the destiny of the dark and vibrant city of Santa Esperanza.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
